name: Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru: Sokudoku Jutsu 3
name_original: Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru: Sokudoku Jutsu 3
description:
Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru: Sokudoku Jutsu 3 is an educational game developed by Milestone. It came out on 25-08-2011. Milestone published the game.
Motto Me de Unou o Kitaeru: Sokudoku Jutsu 3 is available on Nintendo 3DS.
